metadata.title: CVE-2019-7665 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In elfutils 0.175, a heap-based buffer over-read was discovered in thefunction elf32_xlatetom in elf32_xlatetom.c in libelf. A crafted ELF inputcan cause a segmentation fault leading to denial of service (program crash)because ebl_core_note does not reject malformed core file notes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7665` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libasm1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libdw1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libelf1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.165-3ubuntu1.2').
